name: A Short Story: Timmy Goes to the North Pole to Meet Santa Claus
name_original: A Short Story: Timmy Goes to the North Pole to Meet Santa Claus
description:
It's the day before Christmas, and boys and girls across the world eagerly wait for tomorrow to open their presents from Santa Claus. Timmy is no exception, he can't wait to open his present. No, literally, he'd rather go directly to Santa's place a day early to get it!

Length of game: 5 - 10 minutes

This is my entry for Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022. The entire game is made with stock images because I suck at drawing. I still hope you will find some fun playing my first game!

Credits: 

A game made by coolfish (https://coolfish.itch.io/) 

All I Want for Christmas Is You (Make My Wish Come True Edition) by Mariah Carey 

Frostvale Theme by Artix Entertainment 

Disclaimer: No copyright infringement intended. All music, sound effects, and stock images used in this game belong to their rightful owners. 

This game is made with the Ren'Py 7.5.3 engine, developed by Tom 'PyTom' Rothamel.
